Talon/Kup/Windlord/Perceptor

Talon smiled and she glenty squezed Tucson's hands, after that she waited 
and payed attention to the instructions.

Kup slighty laughted and said "I'm not worry, I've seen you in combat 
STraight shot and I know that we will be a great team"

Perceptor sighed and reply by comlink "I spent monts desingin and building 
that base, that is my pride and joy... The master piece of all my career... 
What you ask me to do and knowing what will happen is ask too much of me... 
but I'll sent you the files that you require... Starting to download "

-----Original Message----- 
From: Sandy
Sent: Wednesday, November 17, 2010 12:05 PM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: The Awakening

OOC: Sorry about that Airshadow.  Combining replies for everyone.

BIC:

Tucson gives Talon a thoughtful smile and gently holds her hand for a few 
tender moments.

" The most important thing Talon, is your saftey.  If all else fails, 
whatever happens, if we lose this battle or if we win it, what matters most 
to me, is your saftey, and the saftey of all others."

He turns his head in Rodimus's direction.

" I almost forgot about who would look after the Ark, very good point 
Rodimus.  Quickstride, I'd like you to remain behind with Rodimus as backup. 
He'll need you, since you seem to be able to hear and smell things from far 
distances."

Quickstride salutes.

"Yes sir, I'll make sure nothing comes between us and the Ark."

As Tucson acknowledges everyone, Straight Shot nodds, and quickly transforms 
into her cross bow mode, while leaping up into Kup's hands. She also 
acomidates herself to his hand grip, to make it easier for him to implement 
her.

" Ready when you are Kup.  My mechanisms are the same as a conventional 
cross bow, but I may appear much lighter than the traditional weapon.  I was 
designed like that for quick use, and precision."

Tucson turns his head to Kup.

" Don't worry if you think you're going to miss a target, Straight Shot 
knows how to compensate for that.  She can also help align her target and 
she will let you know when to fire if you think you need her guidence."

Rat Trap nodds to Windlord.

"Hey, Windlords got a point guys, when do we head out?"

Tucson turns to Rat Trap.

" We begin now.  But we are not going to charge into battle, seeing that 
Hydras may suspect our movements.  Cheetor, I trust your instincts to the 
fullest, what I'd like you to do, is scout the parameters first.  Once you 
determine if the coast is clear, relay that to me, and then, we will slowly 
move into position in the areas Cheetor deems fit.  I also suggest we go in 
seperate teams.  Several at a time, spread out, and go unseen.   Rat Trap, 
Windlord, you will travel with Night Shift, seeing that he is well versed in 
stealth combat.  He will get you to the fortress quietly, and under the 
noses of our enemy."

Night Shift turns to Perceptor.

" That's cool with me.  Perceptor, if ya could, send me a download of the 
base parameters, so I know where I'm drivn'.  If I get lost, I could get 
distracted, and then we're in really deep scrap.  The key ta how I operate 
is me keepn' my mind on where it has ta be."

Quickstride looks to Rodimus.

" If ya don't mind, I think you better station me outside, on top of the 
Ark, so I can keep an ear out for trouble.  That way, if something happens, 
I can alert you guys."

Tucson's expression becomes as Resulte as Rodimus's.  Now it was time, it 
was time to show Hydras that with the strength of faith and unity, no other 
power could overshadow the Maximal's or the Autobots greatest attributes.

"Rodimus is correct in his statements. It's time to repay our debt to 
Hydras, and reverse what destruction he has inflicted on this planet, and on 
everyone who innocently suffered needlessly under his regime.  Now, we 
begin.  Cheetor, I'd like you to begin a scan of the parameters, and report 
back to me, as soon as you feel it's safe to continue, Night Shift, 
Windlord, and Rat Trap will begin phase two.  Phase three will involve 
myself, Talon, Lord Elder, and then you will rejoin me for that as well. 
While that happens, Rodimus, Stanton, Bump,and Quickstride, will remain 
here, to be sure the Ark is kept safe.  Rodimus, as soon as Quickstride 
alerts you, that is the time to make your move.  We aren't leaving anything 
to chance, and with our bases covered, we need not worry about that.  But be 
cautious, watch your backs at all times, for anything can happen to anyone, 
and we must not become too overconfident of our abilities, but be cautious 
as we implement them.  Most of all, good luck and keep safe."

Tucson turns to Cheetor.

" Cheetor, you may begin.  And good speed to you comrade."

He puts a gentile hand on Cheetor's shoulder.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@...> wrote:
>
> Rodimus stood looking at the others and nodded a look of cold resolve
> on his face. "Hydras needs to be put out of commission once and for
> all."
>
> "I will stay here at the Ark to keep watch over it." He shrugged
> slightly, "With most of the force leaving, we need someone to watch
> it." He crossed his arms over his chest, "With Legacy, Santon and Bump
> here, we should be able to hold up for a while."
>
> Lord Elder looked around, his optics intent and cautious, "Remember,
> Hydras has a very strong force over there, equal to ours, at least in
> numbers." Elder looked over at the monitor, "Some of our forces are on
> patrol; I will alert them should you guys need some back up."
>
> Cheetor nods emphatically as the others talk and discuss battle plans.
> He looked over at Tuscon, "I will travel with you. You may need the
> back up."
>
> Rodimus opened a commlink with the medbay where Perceptor, Legacy,
> Bump and Santon were trying to work on Nightlight, "How are things
> going in there? We could use Perceptor out here to help us to take
> Hydras' base."
>
> (TAG)
>
> Preston
